creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: one large woven panel with slit for head opening; open sides; black, white and red with three bold vertical bands with simple running white geometric design; twisted self fringe
dimension: 34 x 54 1/2 in. (86.36 x 138.43 cm) (folded, including fringe)
title: Poncho
